description: Add .venv exclusion patterns to CodeRef scan scripts (populate-coderef.py, scan-all.py) to prevent indexing virtual environment files. Reduces scan noise from 19K to actual source code elements only.
notes: Proven issue: .venv scan generated 19K elements instead of ~1K source files. Solutions: (1) Add --exclude .venv flag to CLI commands, (2) Update .gitignore pattern matching, (3) Add default exclusion list to scripts.
